description: Commode; Carving attributed to Joachim Dietrich (German, 1690 - 1753), and sides after engravings by François de Cuvilliés (French, 1695 - 1768); Munich, Germany; about 1745; Gessoed, painted, and gilded pine; gilt-bronze mounts; jaune rose de Brignolles marble top; 83.2 x 126.4 x 61.9 cm (32 3/4 x 49 3/4 x 24 3/8 in.); 72.DA.63.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
